CustomField.description: Created as a part of 2023 R4 enhancements (US-717, 868). Used for GP Fund Request and Grant Approval Cases; manually entered by the submitter. not tied to Deliverables in any systematic way
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Does the donor require detailed reporting on the use of their specific gift or is reporting at the initiative or program level?
CustomField.label: Reporting Requirements
